metadata.synopsis:
The sadistic goblin priestess is branding new converts to the cult of the Absolute. She is a True Soul - tadpoled, but unaware that is the case. She believes she is communing directly with the Absolute.

 She's one of three leaders in the goblin camp, and an important and powerful member of the Absolute's cult. She's cruel and has a sense of superiority over her own kind. Her offers of help are really a ploy to separate players from their friends so that she can imprison them and watch as the parasite eats them alive.

14.speaker: True Soul Gut
14.text: Now, here's somebody special. The Absolute has touched you, hasn't She?
14.context: NodeContext: part carnival-barker, part-priestess. She's revelling in her role at the centre of a public religious conversion ceremony that involves branding the flesh of initiates

54.speaker: True Soul Gut
54.text: Priestess Gut needs to touch you, too - hold out your arm so I can mark your flesh.
54.context: NodeContext: a sly insult in most case: the 'especially' lines are respectful. The others are jokes at the player's expense, but a friendly kind of insult

57.speaker: Lae'zel
57.text: A priestess. One of the leaders, no doubt about it. Let's make her squeal.
57.context: NodeContext: explaining a magical brand in a friendly way

95.speaker: Player
95.text: A priestess. One of the leaders, no doubt about it. Let's make her squeal.

10.speaker: Wyll
10.text: A priestess. One of the leaders, no doubt about it. Let's make her squeal.

55.speaker: Player
55.text: What's that? Tell your friend to keep quiet, or he'll lose his good eye.

71.speaker: True Soul Gut
71.text: What's that? Tell your friend to keep quiet, or he'll lose his good eye.

88.speaker: Player
88.text: Ignore him. Tell me about the mark, priestess.

2.speaker: True Soul Gut
2.text: Ready for the fire, are you?

99.speaker: Player
99.text: Nod to Wyll and prepare to attack.

19.speaker: Player
19.text: One of the leaders. Split her skull and be done with it.
19.context: NodeContext: explaining a magical brand in a friendly way

104.speaker: Player
104.text: One of the leaders. Split her skull and be done with it.
104.context: NodeContext: explaining a magical brand in a friendly way

23.speaker: Lae'zel
23.text: One of the leaders. Split her skull and be done with it.
23.context: NodeContext: explaining a magical brand in a friendly way

37.speaker: Player
37.text: Why should I let you brand me?
37.context: NodeContext: explaining a magical brand in a friendly way

0.speaker: Player
0.text: Why should I let you brand me?
0.context: NodeContext: explaining a magical brand in a friendly way

21.speaker: True Soul Gut
21.text: Lets the faithful recognise one another quick-sharp. That way, nobody'll mess with you.
21.context: NodeContext: explaining a magical brand in a friendly way

52.speaker: True Soul Gut
52.text: An' it's charged with magic. Ordinary slobs can't see it; only us that follow the Absolute.
52.context: NodeContext: explaining a magical brand in a friendly way

69.speaker: Player
69.text: Charged with magic? Perhaps that explains the ease with which these goblins submit to True Souls.

66.speaker: Gale
66.text: Charged with magic? Perhaps that explains the ease with which these goblins submit to True Souls.

50.speaker: Player
50.text: You ready? Brace yourself - this'll sting.

97.speaker: True Soul Gut
97.text: You ready? Brace yourself - this'll sting.

92.speaker: Player
92.text: I doubt that, but go ahead.
92.context: CinematicNodeContext: She applies the branding iron to the player's hand, leaving behind the mark of the Absolute, glowing. After a beat, it fades.|NodeContext: internal dialogue as the player reacts to both the 'pain' from a branding iron applied (voluntarily) to their hand, and a goblin priestess exploring their mind telepathically

34.speaker: Player
34.text: I have always wanted to smell my own burning flesh.
34.context: CinematicNodeContext: She applies the branding iron to the player's hand, leaving behind the mark of the Absolute, glowing. After a beat, it fades.|NodeContext: internal dialogue as the player reacts to both the 'pain' from a branding iron applied (voluntarily) to their hand, and a goblin priestess exploring their mind telepathically

56.speaker: True Soul Gut
56.context: CinematicNodeContext: She applies the branding iron to the player's hand, leaving behind the mark of the Absolute, glowing. After a beat, it fades.|NodeContext: internal dialogue as the player reacts to both the 'pain' from a branding iron applied (voluntarily) to their hand, and a goblin priestess exploring their mind telepathically

49.speaker: Narrator
49.text: *As the pain muddles your thoughts, your minds become entangled. A familiar sensation - she, too, carries a parasite.*
49.context: CinematicNodeContext: She applies the branding iron to the player's hand, leaving behind the mark of the Absolute, glowing. After a beat, it fades.|NodeContext: internal dialogue as the player reacts to both the 'pain' from a branding iron applied (voluntarily) to their hand, and a goblin priestess exploring their mind telepathically

65.text: *Darkness seems to swallow the temple, leaving you with a vision of the goblin priestess, receiving instruction from a handsome young man. One of the Chosen...*
65.context: InternalNodeContext: Narrator nodes are temporary until assets are available for cinematic nodes

103.speaker: Narrator
103.text: *Darkness seems to swallow the temple, leaving you with a vision of the goblin priestess, receiving instruction from a handsome young man. One of the Chosen...*
103.context: InternalNodeContext: Narrator nodes are temporary until assets are available for cinematic nodes

60.speaker: Narrator
60.text: *The vision dissolves away. You stand before the goblin priestess in the temple once again.*
60.context: NodeContext: feeling a goblin priestess' faith - it is overpowering. And behind it, a creepy discovery - a parasitic tadpole, the same as the player carries in their own mind

8.context: NodeContext: feeling a goblin priestess' faith - it is overpowering. And behind it, a creepy discovery - a parasitic tadpole, the same as the player carries in their own mind

75.speaker: Player
75.context: NodeContext: feeling a goblin priestess' faith - it is overpowering. And behind it, a creepy discovery - a parasitic tadpole, the same as the player carries in their own mind

18.speaker: Narrator
18.text: *Her faith floods into you - a tide of shuddering ecstasy. Her tadpole nestles within that mania, secure... hidden.*
18.context: NodeContext: feeling a goblin priestess' faith - it is overpowering. And behind it, a creepy discovery - a parasitic tadpole, the same as the player carries in their own mind

51.speaker: True Soul Gut
51.text: I feel you in there, digging around.
51.context: NodeContext: 'mush' being brain/head - we've just psionically communicated with her and she's amused

74.speaker: True Soul Gut
74.text: Works both ways. And I saw some weird shadows swimming around in your head just now.
74.context: NodeContext: 'works both ways' being a psionic connection. Disturbed by the weird shadows

87.speaker: True Soul Gut
87.text: Maybe I can help with that. Us True Souls got to look out for one another.
87.context: NodeContext: pondering - impressed that we are True Souls (high-ranking members of her religion)

28.speaker: Player
28.text: Do you think you can fix whatever's causing those shadows?

79.speaker: True Soul Gut
79.text: With the Absolute's will, I can fix anythin'.

83.speaker: True Soul Gut
83.text: Let's deal with this in my chapel. It's private. Don't want this lot interfering with True Soul business.
83.context: NodeContext: leading us away to her private chapel; speaking quietly as if discussing secret plans

67.speaker: Player
67.text: There's a creature inside my head. Can you help with that?
67.context: NodeContext: surprise and awe - she's horrified but also VERY intrigued

27.speaker: True Soul Gut
27.text: A creature? There's definitely something rotten in there.
27.context: NodeContext: surprise and awe - she's horrified but also VERY intrigued

89.speaker: True Soul Gut
89.text: Let me take a closer look. I ain't seen anything like this before.
89.context: NodeContext: bristling with irritation, and accusatory but still treating us as an ally

24.speaker: Player
24.text: I'm pretty sure you're infected, too.
24.context: NodeContext: bristling with irritation, and accusatory but still treating us as an ally

7.speaker: True Soul Gut
7.text: Eh? Ain't nothin' wrong with me. You're the one who's sick in the head.
7.context: NodeContext: bristling with irritation, and accusatory but still treating us as an ally

36.speaker: True Soul Gut
36.context: NodeContext: suspicious and curious, but still trusts us for now

68.speaker: Player
68.text: You'll never see anything like it again - time to die.

63.speaker: Player
63.text: Any help would be appreciated. I need a healer.

47.speaker: True Soul Gut
47.text: You've come to the right place.

29.speaker: Player
29.text: Can we talk privately? This is a sensitive matter.

32.speaker: True Soul Gut
32.text: Of course. Don't want this rabble interfering with True Soul business. Let's go to my chapel.

78.speaker: Player
78.text: As if I'd trust a creature like you to meddle in my mind. Time to die, True Soul.

61.speaker: Player
61.context: NodeContext: deliberately thwarting a goblin's attempts to read our mind

82.speaker: Narrator
82.text: *Your minds brush against one another but are swiftly parted.*
82.context: NodeContext: deliberately thwarting a goblin's attempts to read our mind

64.speaker: True Soul Gut
64.text: Don't wanna get intimate in front of the novices? Fair enough. Got some weird shadows in your head.
64.context: NodeContext: 'get intimate' referring to a psionic connection rather than a physical one; disturbed by the shadows

73.speaker: True Soul Gut
73.text: Already spoke to one of your mates - a True Soul, just like you. Said I'd help them, and that goes for you as well.
73.context: NodeContext: trying to convince us that everything's above board, and that we're all on the same team.

76.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player sees a brief vision of Priestess Gut standing before Gortash in a TBD vision settingInternalNodeContext: Cinematics blocked due to lack of assets for Gortash. Narrator nodes until assets available

42.speaker: Player
42.text: Actually, I'd rather not go through with this.

102.speaker: Player
102.text: I assume this mark has a purpose.
102.context: NodeContext: proud, explaining her flock's devotion

9.speaker: True Soul Gut
9.text: Shows our devotion to the Absolute. These maggots see how strong we are with Her guidance.
9.context: NodeContext: proud, explaining her flock's devotion

105.speaker: True Soul Gut
105.text: Whole camp'll be branded soon. An' you should be, too.

108.speaker: Player
108.text: I'm not letting you burn me for life on a whim.

5.speaker: True Soul Gut
5.text: Maybe you don't need it. After all, you're special, ain't you? Like me.

16.speaker: Narrator
16.text: *She probes your mind, tangling your thoughts with hers. A familiar sensation - she, too, carries a parasite.*

30.speaker: Player
30.text: I'm here to spill your guts across the floor.
30.context: NodeContext: Excited, slightly feral "yes!" as Astarion starts to let the animal out.

81.speaker: True Soul Gut
81.text: Yes - give in to your bloodlust.
81.context: NodeContext: Excited, slightly feral "yes!" as Astarion starts to let the animal out.

44.speaker: Lae'zel
44.text: Yes - give in to your bloodlust.
44.context: NodeContext: Excited, slightly feral "yes!" as Astarion starts to let the animal out.

77.speaker: Shadowheart
77.text: That's a bigger fight than we needed to pick - not the subtlest of assassins, are you?
77.context: NodeContext: Excited, slightly feral "yes!" as Astarion starts to let the animal out.

22.speaker: Karlach
22.text: We're fighting the whole tribe at once? Subtle. Next time, let me do the talking.
22.context: NodeContext: Excited, slightly feral "yes!" as Astarion starts to let the animal out.

11.speaker: Astarion
11.text: Yes! And I thought you weren't any fun.
11.context: NodeContext: Excited, slightly feral "yes!" as Astarion starts to let the animal out.

72.speaker: True Soul Gut
72.text: You think you can hurt me? This'll be good!

45.speaker: True Soul Gut
45.text: You think you can hurt me? This'll be good!

48.speaker: Wyll
48.text: You want to fight all of them? So be it - I have your back.

80.speaker: Gale
80.text: Whoa! There are a lot of guts to go around in this place. Are you sure you...? Never mind. Too late.

20.speaker: Player
20.text: I serve only my oath, I will not bear your brand.

15.speaker: True Soul Gut
15.text: Ready to figure out what's goin' on with those shadows in your head?

91.speaker: Player
91.text: I know what's wrong - there's a creature inside my brain.

13.speaker: Player
13.text: I've been looking for a healer. Think you can help?

101.speaker: Player
101.text: No, but by my oath, I am ready to take your head.

35.speaker: True Soul Gut
35.text: I only deal with those what have faith. Clear off.

39.speaker: True Soul Gut
39.text: Good to see you still standing. Ready to figure out what that critter in your head is doing?

53.speaker: True Soul Gut
53.text: Still lookin' to get yer head fixed? Best ask the Absolute for help - I can't figure it out.
53.context: NodeContext: Confused, slightly irritated with herself
